meanings.definition: Not characteristic of an individual person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The team worked together as a nonindividual unit to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent2: In a forest, the trees form a nonindividual entity, creating a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent3: The nonindividual behavior of the ants marching in a straight line fascinated the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The nonindividual identity of the flock of birds in the sky painted a mesmerizing picture.
meanings.sent5: The nonindividual nature of the clouds blending seamlessly in the sky was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Not separate or distinct from others.
meanings.sent1: The concept of family emphasizes the nonindividual bond between its members.
meanings.sent2: In a school of fish, they move as a nonindividual group, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent3: The nonindividual colors of the rainbow blended harmoniously in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The nonindividual voices of the choir singers created a symphony of sound.
meanings.sent5: The nonindividual petals of the flower formed a perfect circle of beauty.
